people.title: People to search
people.description: List of people to find emails for. Each entry should be in format: firstName,lastName,domain or firstName lastName,domain

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of requests to process in parallel (1-50)

delayBetweenRequests.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayBetweenRequests.description: Delay between API requests in milliseconds to avoid rate limiting
